PerfectNetExp.abs: pelf 钱财，不义之财pellmell 混乱地pellucid 清晰的，清澈的

RelatedPhrase.word: read everything pellmell and without judgement

list.key: read everything pellmell and without judgement
list.exp: 不辨好坏无论什么都读
list.abs: 突然一窝蜂地向...冲去 break into a pellmell rush for不辨好坏无论什么都读 read everything pellmell and without judgement清澄的天空 a pellucid sky

entry.def: If you move pell-mell somewhere, you move there in a hurried, uncontrolled way.

example.ex: All three of us rushed pell-mell into the kitchen.
example.tran: 我们三人全都匆忙跑进厨房。
